snippet: France can help, but Mali must win the fight against Islamist rebels.
abstract: Editorial cautions French Pres Francois Hollande against beginning ground assault in Mali, even though initial airstrikes have failed to halt rebels' advance; contends that challenge of dislodging rebels from northern part of country must remain with Mali's Army and its West African allies.
lead_paragraph: France can help, but Mali must win the fight against Islamist rebels.

keywords.value: Al Qaeda in the Islamic Maghreb
keywords.name: organizations
